title: Carbon-free Transportation Month
descrtipion: Go Car-free! Use public transportation, walking, or biking

title: Zero-waste Challenge Month
description: Produce as little waste as possible by practicing the 5 R's: Refuse, Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, and Rot!

title: Planting Tree Month
description: Trees are best to be planted in the Spring/Fall

title: Energy Conservation Month
description: Turn off lights, use energy-efficient bulbs, unplug unused appliances
